definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The back end side should be easy for admins to make any updates.

definition: prudent/cautious/to be in charge of ritual ceremonies/to hold an important office
Zhang Zhidong (1837-1909), prominent politician in late Qing
Xu Shichang (1855-1939), politician associated with the Northern Warlords, president of China in 1921
Zhao Erxun (1844-1927), modern historian, compiled the Draft History of the Qing dynasty 清史稿
Zhang Yinhuan (1837-1900), late Qing politician and senior Chinese diplomat
